entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rankin Inlet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:07 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -39.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rankin Inlet Airport 10:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -39.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -57
Dewpoint: -43.0°C
Wind: NW 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 57 this morning and minus 52 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 42. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
